fields.name: Subalignments:
fields.value: Head, Informant, Saboteur, Hitman, Bouncer, Support

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 682: Despot will always spawn.
- An Insurgency Informant role will always spawn as long as the Insurgency has at least two members. 
- There can be, at most, one Insurgancy Informant role for every 3 Insurgency members. 
- Insurgency members don't know each others' roles or names.
- No factional chat
- No factional kill

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who oppose the Insurgency.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Eliminate all who oppose the Insurgency.
